verses.name: Nehemiah 7:50
verses.text: The children of Reaiah, the children of Rezin, the children of Nekoda,

verses.name: Nehemiah 7:51
verses.text: The children of Gazzam, the children of Uzza, the children of Phaseah,

verses.name: Nehemiah 7:52
verses.text: The children of Besai, the children of Meunim, the children of Nephishesim,

verses.name: Nehemiah 7:53
verses.text: The children of Bakbuk, the children of Hakupha, the children of Harhur,

verses.name: Nehemiah 7:54
verses.text: The children of Bazlith, the children of Mehida, the children of Harsha,

verses.name: Nehemiah 7:55
verses.text: The children of Barkos, the children of Sisera, the children of Tamah,

verses.name: Nehemiah 7:56
verses.text: The children of Neziah, the children of Hatipha.

verses.name: Nehemiah 7:57
verses.text: The children of Solomon’s servants: the children of Sotai, the children of Sophereth, the children of Perida,
